artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Wakasaya Yoichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: standing woman holding a yellow ladle in her PR hand and a straw hat with two black inked characters in her PL hand, looking disdainfully at a portrait of a woman with many gold hair ornaments in a green roundel in URC; standing woman wears primarily green kimono with white foliage patterns
inscription: in circle: {mitate Miyagino} | (April 8, Tenpo_ 7) | {Iwai Hanshiro_} | (Died at the age of 40) | Farewell poem
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Iwai Hanshirō VI as Shinobu with Segawa Kikunoijō as Miyagino
